Chess Studies L A Liggett 2019-06-24 Chapter 1 Overview These are just some chess notes. There are a number of different themes that can be used for embedded boards, the options for which are listed below: theme: blue, blue2, blue3, canvas, wood, wood2, wood3, maple, green, marble, brown, leather, grey, metal, olive, purple There are also coloration themes: bg: light, dark Here is an example of what should be added after the html link of a study to style the board and start at initial position ?bg=dark&theme=metal#0 And here is an example and embedded chess study.
